description.value: To keep the peace, you disrupt those who seek to break it. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Deafness]{Deafness} and 4th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Silence]{Silence} once per day each as innate spells. The tradition of these spells is the one you chose for the Nantambu Chime-Ringer Dedication feat.

source.value: Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind
